Advanced Features for Modern Manufacturing

Combining cutting-edge AR technology with practical manufacturing workflows

📱

Mobile AR App

Simple smartphone interface with on-device computer vision model for immediate defect capture and spatial tracking.

  • Point-and-capture defect marking
  • Real-time AR origin placement
  • Haptic feedback system
  • Offline-capable processing
🎯

Precision Measurement

Advanced computer vision algorithms capture exact dimensions and spatial coordinates relative to blade geometry.

  • Automatic dimension calculation
  • Spatial coordinate tracking
  • Leading edge reference points
  • Blade root positioning
🌐

Web Portal Analytics

Centralized engineering portal with interactive 3D models, filtering, and export capabilities for ERP integration.

  • Interactive 3D blade models
  • Defect filtering by type/severity
  • CSV/PDF export functionality
  • Real-time data streaming

Key Capabilities

  • XFMEA Integration: Cross-references with risk frameworks for tailored repair instructions
  • Multi-Defect Support: Handles wrinkles, delamination, foreign inclusions, and more
  • Real-time Streaming: REST API for immediate data and image transmission
  • Lay-up Stage Awareness: Contextual guidance based on current production stage
  • Quality Standardization: Eliminates assessment criteria drift between factories
  • Engineering Handoff: Streamlined complex repair workflows

Technical Specifications

  • Platform: iOS/Android mobile app + Web portal
  • Processing: On-device computer vision + cloud analytics
  • Tracking: ARKit/ARCore-based spatial tracking
  • Integration: REST API for ERP/MES systems
  • Lighting: Requires ≥600 lux for optimal AR tracking
  • Export Formats: CSV, PDF, high-resolution images
